app.title: PATH Train Tracker
app.description: Real-time PATH train arrivals for New York and New Jersey
app.tagline: Track live train arrivals • Multiple stations • Real-time updates

nav.title: Path Tracker
nav.realTimeArrivalsDesc: Track PATH train arrivals in real-time with our live dashboard
nav.serviceMapsDesc: View PATH system maps for different service periods
nav.aboutPathDesc: Learn more about the PATH train system
nav.dataSourceDesc: Official PATH schedules and real-time data
nav.addToHomeScreenDesc: Install this app on your device for quick access
nav.disclaimerDesc: Important legal information and data sources
nav.privacyDesc: Your data stays on your device
nav.contactDesc: Questions or feedback about this app

footer.tagline: By the Path rider, for the path rider
footer.dataSource: Data © Port Authority of NY & NJ • Updates every 10s

home.pathSystemDesc: The PATH system connects New York City and New Jersey with 13 stations across 4 lines.
home.serviceUnavailableDesc: We're currently unable to connect to the PATH data service...

station.errorLatest: Unable to get latest arrivals. Showing last known data.
station.noArrivals: No arrivals scheduled for this station at the moment.

alerts.title: PATH Alerts
alerts.pageDescription: Real-time service alerts, delays, and disruptions for the PATH train system
alerts.showingCachedAlerts: Showing cached alerts. Unable to fetch latest updates.
alerts.errorLatest: Unable to get latest alerts. Showing last known data.
alerts.noAlerts: No active alerts at this time.
alerts.allServicesNormal: All PATH services are operating normally.
alerts.noMatchingAlerts: No alerts match your filter criteria.

update.title: New Update Available!
update.description: Get the latest features, improvements, and bug fixes.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.independentPlatform: Path Tracker is an independent platform and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or officially connected to the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey (PANYNJ). All data provided on this platform is sourced from publicly available information and is intended for informational purposes only.
disclaimer.accuracyDesc: While every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information provided on Path Tracker, schedules and updates are subject to change, and real-time data may vary. Users are encouraged to verify critical travel details through official sources and use Path Tracker as a complementary tool for trip planning.
disclaimer.officialInfo: For the most up-to-date and official information, please refer to:

addToHomeScreen.title: Add Path Tracker to Your Home Screen
addToHomeScreen.description: Get quick access to real-time PATH train arrivals by installing Path Tracker as a web app on your device.
addToHomeScreen.step1Desc: While viewing Path Tracker in your browser, tap the share button at the bottom of your screen (Safari) or in the browser menu.
addToHomeScreen.step2Desc: Look for the "Add to Home Screen" option in the share menu. You may need to scroll down to find it.
addToHomeScreen.step3Desc: Tap "Add to Home Screen" and then confirm by tapping "Add" in the popup dialog. The app will now appear on your home screen!
addToHomeScreen.benefit1: Instant access to real-time PATH arrivals
addToHomeScreen.benefit2: No need to remember the website URL
addToHomeScreen.benefit4: Works offline for previously viewed stations

closestStation.title: Closest Station
closestStation.noArrivals: No arrivals scheduled for this station at the moment.

serviceMaps.title: PATH Service Maps
serviceMaps.description: View PATH system maps for different service periods. Click and drag to pan, use controls to zoom.
serviceMaps.dragToPan: Drag to pan around the map.
serviceMaps.disclaimerText: Service maps are sourced from the official PATH website. For the most current schedules and service information, please visit the official PATH schedules and maps page. Service schedules and routes are subject to change without notice.
